sections.instructions: Describe the displacement flows , current refugee/returnee figures, projected arrivals, and key protection/assistance gaps. Include daily arrival surges, pressures on local resources, and needs for CRIs, shelters, and peaceful coexistence activities.

sections.fixed_text: The project will provide emergency core relief items and shelter assistance, plus peaceful coexistence activities in areas hosting new arrivals and refugees.

sections.instructions: Cover emergency shelters at transit sites, communal and semi-permanent shelters in hosting areas, transit center extensions, and site/infrastructure improvements (e.g., solar streetlights, drainage, fencing). Include procurement/transport/warehousing of materials and targeting of vulnerable groups.

Explain registration/identification of beneficiaries, procurement/transport/warehousing, and distribution. Describe the CRI package composition (sleeping mats, blankets, jerry can, mosquito nets, dignity kits, soap) and prioritization criteria.

Detail hafir (water dam) construction incl. capacity assumptions, education support (school rehabilitation scope and classroom capacities), sensitization/awareness, community networks, PSS, peacebuilding, recreational activities.
